millsfield:images_texts:
W. A. M. Burcen
FLY
Aeromarine
FLYING BOATS
ALWAYS OVER THE WATER
Nothing more serious can happen to an Aeromarine
in flight than an enforced descent-and herein is one
of the great advantages of travel in flying boats- you
always, always have the necessary alghting space;
You fly only over the broad free spaces of the waters'
This gives you the knowledge of 100 per
cent. safety when you take your flight.
Aeromarine Airways, Inc.
(Established 1920)
Largest Aerial Transportation Company in the
World Operating Flying Boats
Eleven Passenger Enclosed Cabin Air Cruisers
Six Seat Navy Open Cockpit Flying Boats
Executive Offices:
1800 TIMES BUILDING, NEW YORK
Phone Bryant 4505-6147
1125 BOARDWALK, ATLANTIC CITY
Phone Atlantic City 5864
COFYRIGHT AERONARINE AIRWAYS, INC.. 1922

FLY
WITH THE FAMOUS
romarine
"BLACK TAIL' FLEE
Equally at home on the water as in the air
"Remarkable Performance"
OF THE
Aeromarine Airways, Inc.
150,380 Miles Flown in Absolute Safety
10,700 Passengers Carried
Special Week-End Charter Parties
A delightful way to entertain your guests over the week end-
leave New York on Friday or Saturday in an Aeromarine flying
boat returning Monday morning after a refreshing flight to and
from some shore resort—rates are exceedingly low.
AEROMARINE AIRWAYS, Inc.
1800 TIMES BUILDING, NEW YORK
Phone Bryant 4505-6147
1125 BOARDWALK, ATLANTIC CITY
Phone Atlantic City 5864
